All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Command
The Command enum represents the available commands in the vending machine system.
Denomination
The Denomination class represents the currency denominations used in the vending machine.
Item
The Item class represents an item in the vending machine.
MaintenanceData
The MaintenanceData class holds the maintenance's data.
MaintenanceService
The MaintenanceService class maintains the vending machine's condition.
MaintenanceView
The MaintenanceView class acts as the display of the maintenance.
Slot
The Slot class represents a slot in the vending machine that holds an item.
Transactions
The Transactions class represents a log of item transactions in the vending machine.
VendingMachine
The VendingMachine class represents a vending machine that contains slots with items.
VendingMachineController
Teh VendingMachineController class represents the vending machine's controller.
VendingMachineDemo
The VendingMachineDemo class represents a demo program for a vending machine.
VendingMachineView
The VendingMachineView class provides methods for displaying information related to a vending machine.
